content: Net revenues for the period was three hundred and fifty nine point five million dollars, thirty point four percent higher than the two fifty eight million dollars posted for the same quarter last year, and up eight point eight percent sequentially over the first quarter of fiscal twenty twenty two. Selling, general and administrative expenses in the second quarter of fiscal twenty twenty two were forty five point four million dollars or twelve point six percent of net revenue compared to thirty five point five million dollars or thirteen point seven percent of net revenue during the same quarter last year.
